title: HOT TOOLS 2108 Nano Ceramic Marcel Curling Iron, Black/Purple, 1 Inch

All the benefits of HOT TOOLS' gets hot stays hot performance combined with ceramic's shine enhancing properties and titanium's hardness, high heat tolerance and resistance to corrosion. Separate on and off switch allows the rheostat to inch stay at inch your favorite heat setting marcel iron features. Locking rotating marcel handle touch guard protector.
